item.title: The Ad Specialist Startup Is Running ICO Successfully - News BTC
item.description:
The advertising is among numberless spheres of blockchain implementation. And today there is already a company with successful ICO and impressive MVP. The digital advertising market is a rapidly growing one. According to Statista.com, the total market for media and advertising is more than $550 billion. And of course, the digital ads segment is growing … Continue reading The Ad Specialist Startup Is Running ICO Successfully

The post The Ad Specialist Startup Is Running ICO Successfully appeared first on NewsBTC.

item.title: Impersonators Scam Seele ICO Investors out of $2 Million in Ethereum - CryptoCoins News
item.description:
The post Impersonators Scam Seele ICO Investors out of $2 Million in Ethereum appeared first on CCN

Potential Seele ICO investors were recently scammed out of nearly $2 million by impersonators posing as admins, who used the company’s Telegram channel to get them to send their money over before the token sale began. Seele, a blockchain project that describes itself as “blockchain 4.0,” with potential applications in IoT, game assets, fintech, and

The post Impersonators Scam Seele ICO Investors out of $2 Million in Ethereum appeared first on CCN
item.dc:creator: CryptoCoins News

item.title: UAE Regulator Warns Residents Over ICO Investment Risks - CryptoCoins News
item.description:
The post UAE Regulator Warns Residents Over ICO Investment Risks appeared first on CCN

The UAE’s financial markets watchdog and regulator has ‘raised the alarm’ over initial coin offering (ICO) investments. In a circular published on Sunday, the UAE’s Securities and Commodities Authority (SCA) urged investors to be wary of risks associated with investments into ‘all digital, token-based fundraising activities or investments schemes’ in the Emirates. Certain ICOs aren’t

The post UAE Regulator Warns Residents Over ICO Investment Risks appeared first on CCN
item.dc:creator: CryptoCoins News

item.title: Scammers Steal Over $1.8 Mln By Posing As Admins of Seele ICO - Cointelegraph
item.description: Fake admins at ICO scammed investors out of $1.8 mln in Ether over Seele’s telegram channel #NEWS
